Author: Aki, k-kz, ele-starshade, damolitionn, Taurenkey, Augporto, grimgal
Name: XIVSlothCombo
Description: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Changelog: Features, Fixes & Enhancements for Framework, DRG, PLD, RDM, SAM, SCH, SMN, WAR, NINPvP, SAMPvP and WARPvP. Please check the project's GitHub or Discord for a full changelog.
